title: ICE: `bound types encountered in super_relate_tys` `non_lifetime_binders`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] #![crate_type = "lib"] trait Trait { type Output; } async fn walk2(filter: F) where for F: Trait<&'a u32> + 'a, {} fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (9aa5c24b7 2023-02-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9aa5c24b7d763fb98d998819571128ff2eb8a3ca commit-date: 2023-02-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0670]: `async fn` is not permitted in Rust 2015 --> /tmp/im/2ec83234343195293d1cafeb6c8dd3911c99ba01.rs:8:1 | 8 | async fn walk2(filter: F) | ^^^^^ to use `async fn`, switch to Rust 2018 or later | = help: pass `--edition 2021` to `rustc` = note: for more on editions, read https://doc.rust-lang.org/edition-guide error[E0261]: use of undeclared lifetime name `'a` --> /tmp/im/2ec83234343195293d1cafeb6c8dd3911c99ba01.rs:8:19 | 8 | async fn walk2(filter: F) | - ^^ undeclared lifetime | | | help: consider introducing lifetime `'a` here: `'a,` error[E0261]: use of undeclared lifetime name `'a` --> /tmp/im/2ec83234343195293d1cafeb6c8dd3911c99ba01.rs:10:22 | 10 | for F: Trait<&'a u32> + 'a, | ^^ undeclared lifetime | = note: for more information on higher-ranked polymorphism, visit https://doc.rust-lang.org/nomicon/hrtb.html help: consider making the bound lifetime-generic with a new `'a` lifetime | 10 | for F: for<'a> Trait<&'a u32> + 'a, | +++++++ help: consider making the bound lifetime-generic with a new `'a` lifetime | 10 | for<'a, F> F: Trait<&'a u32> + 'a, | +++ help: consider introducing lifetime `'a` here | 8 | async fn walk2<'a, F: 'a>(filter: F) | +++ error[E0261]: use of undeclared lifetime name `'a` --> /tmp/im/2ec83234343195293d1cafeb6c8dd3911c99ba01.rs:10:32 | 10 | for F: Trait<&'a u32> + 'a, | ^^ undeclared lifetime | help: consider making the bound lifetime-generic with a new `'a` lifetime | 10 | for<'a, F> F: Trait<&'a u32> + 'a, | +++ help: consider introducing lifetime `'a` here | 8 | async fn walk2<'a, F: 'a>(filter: F) | +++ warning: the feature `non_lifetime_binders` is incomplete and may not be safe to use and/or cause compiler crashes --> /tmp/im/2ec83234343195293d1cafeb6c8dd3911c99ba01.rs:1:12 | 1 | #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: see issue #1 for more information = note: `#[warn(incomplete_features)]` on by default ```
